mapper.insert: insert into board (bno, btitle, bcontent, mid, bdate, bhitcount) values(seq_bno.nextval, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{mid}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: select bno, btitle, bcontent, mid, bdate, bhitcount, battachoname, battachsname, battachtype, battachdata from board
mapper.update: update board set btitle=#{btitle}, bcontent=#{bcontent} where bno=#{bno}
